Title: The Pavlovich Brothers
Plot: While the FBI searches for a Serbian family of kidnappers, Red uses them in a scheme to out Tom, leading to a fateful confrontation with Liz.
GuestStars: Hisham Tawfiq, Amir Arison, Stivi Paskoski, Goran Ivanovski, Renne Gjoni, James Biberi, Natalie Kim, Marc Damon Johnson
